extends java.lang.Object

      • complete

        public <T> void complete(Request<T> r,
                         T result)
        Description copied from interface: MessageBus
        Notifying the MessageBus that the request r is completed and its result was result. When this method is called, the message-bus will implicitly add the special RequestCompleted message to the queue of the requesting micro-service, the RequestCompleted message will also contain the result of the request (result).

        Specified by:
        complete in interface MessageBus
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the result expected by the completed request
        Parameters:
        r - the completed request
        result - the result of the completed request

      • sendBroadcast

        public void sendBroadcast(Broadcast b)
        Description copied from interface: MessageBus
        add the Broadcast b to the message queues of all the micro-services subscribed to b.getClass().

        Specified by:
        sendBroadcast in interface MessageBus
        Parameters:
        b - the message to add to the queues.

      • sendRequest

        public boolean sendRequest(Request<?> r,
                           MicroService requester)
        Description copied from interface: MessageBus
        add the Request r to the message queue of one of the micro-services subscribed to r.getClass() in a round-robin fashion.

        Specified by:
        sendRequest in interface MessageBus
        Parameters:
        r - the request to add to the queue.
        requester - the MicroService sending r.
        Returns:
        true if there was at least one micro-service subscribed to r.getClass() and false otherwise.

      • register

        public void register(MicroService m)
        Description copied from interface: MessageBus
        allocates a message-queue for the MicroService m.

        Specified by:
        register in interface MessageBus
        Parameters:
        m - the micro-service to create a queue for.

      • unregister

        public void unregister(MicroService m)
        Description copied from interface: MessageBus
        remove the message queue allocated to m via the call to MessageBus.register(bgu.spl.mics.MicroService) and clean all references related to m in this message-bus. If m was not registered, nothing should happen.

        Specified by:
        unregister in interface MessageBus
        Parameters:
        m - the micro-service to unregister.

      • awaitMessage

        public Message awaitMessage(MicroService m)
                     throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Description copied from interface: MessageBus
        using this method, a registered micro-service can take message from its allocated queue. This method is blocking -meaning that if no messages are available in the micro-service queue it should wait until a message became available. The method should throw the IllegalStateException in the case where m was never registered.

        Specified by:
        awaitMessage in interface MessageBus
        Parameters:
        m - the micro-service requesting to take a message from its message queue
        Returns:
        the next message in the m's queue (blocking)
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted while waiting for a message to became available.
